author: mturk
msg: Use APP_POOL_ID server variable (if running IIS6+) to the server name for more unique name. This should prevent problems with multiple pool registrations. Still have to decide if supported or not. IMO isap-redirect should be allowed to register to a single Application Pool

author: karpet
msg: first pass at C build for charmonizer, using autoconf. NOTE that this is a proof of concept only, and a real C TAP test harness and fleshing out of the build/liblucy.pl script in particular, are still TODO
